layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x48
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x48
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x32
      LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (0,0) size 784x16
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 16x16
          text run at (0,0) width 16: "a"
      LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (0,16) size 784x16
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 16x16
          text run at (0,0) width 16: "b"
selection start: position 5 of child 0 {#text} of child 3 {DIV} of body
selection end:   position 6 of child 0 {#text} of child 5 {DIV} of body
